Academic.question: "I am not able to understand the concepts in the advanced machine learning course."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for reaching out. We will arrange extra classes or suggest tutorial materials. Would you prefer a one-on-one session or a group discussion?"

Academic.question: "My marks for the midterm exam are not yet updated."
Academic.answer: "Your concern has been recorded. The academic office has been informed, and your grades will be updated within 2 working days."

Academic.question: "I need clarification about the attendance policy."
Academic.answer: "The attendance policy has been shared in the student handbook. Would you like us to email it to you or arrange a discussion with the academic office?"

Academic.question: "The syllabus was not completed before the exam."
Academic.answer: "We will look into the matter with the course instructor. Meanwhile, additional study resources or tutorials will be provided."

Academic.question: "I did not receive my course registration confirmation."
Academic.answer: "Please provide your registration ID. The academic office will verify and confirm within 1 working day."

Academic.question: "I was marked absent in a class I attended."
Academic.answer: "Please share the date and course details. The attendance record will be reviewed and corrected if necessary."

Academic.question: "The study material uploaded to the portal is incomplete."
Academic.answer: "We have informed the course instructor. The complete material will be uploaded by [specific date]."

Academic.question: "The exam dates for two subjects overlap."
Academic.answer: "We are investigating this issue and will release a revised schedule. Thank you for bringing this to our attention."

Academic.question: "The lecture notes for my course are not available on the portal."
Academic.answer: "We will inform the course instructor to upload the lecture notes as soon as possible. Please check again by [specific date]."

Academic.question: "The class timings for my elective course are too inconvenient."
Academic.answer: "We will forward your feedback to the academic department. A scheduling review will be conducted for future semesters."

Academic.question: "The online quizzes are not accessible from mobile devices."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Our IT department is working on ensuring compatibility across all devices."

Academic.question: "The lab assignments are too difficult and time-consuming."
Academic.answer: "We will communicate with the course instructor regarding your concerns and may consider offering additional support or revised deadlines."

Academic.question: "I missed the class due to an emergency, and I couldn't get the notes."
Academic.answer: "Please contact your class representative, who can provide you with the notes. You can also reach out to the instructor for any clarification."

Academic.question: "My project topic was rejected without sufficient explanation."
Academic.answer: "We will arrange a meeting between you and the faculty member to clarify the reasoning behind the rejection and suggest alternative topics."

Academic.question: "I received an unfair grade in my project."
Academic.answer: "Your project evaluation will be reviewed. If necessary, we will arrange for re-evaluation by an impartial faculty member."

Academic.question: "There is a lack of resources in the programming lab."
Academic.answer: "The IT department has been informed. Additional machines will be made available, and resources will be updated."

Academic.question: "I need additional time to complete my assignment due to health reasons."
Academic.answer: "Your request has been noted. Please submit a medical certificate, and we will arrange an extension for you."

Academic.question: "The assignment submission portal is not accepting submissions."
Academic.answer: "The issue has been reported to the technical team. The portal will be available for submissions within [specific time]."

Academic.question: "The course content is outdated and doesn't reflect recent developments."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for your feedback. We are reviewing the course syllabus and will ensure it is updated with the latest information and trends."

Academic.question: "I didn't receive my exam results yet."
Academic.answer: "Your exam results are under review. You will receive the final results within [specific time]. Thank you for your patience."

Academic.question: "The assignments are given with very little time to complete."
Academic.answer: "We will forward your concern to the course coordinator to review the assignment deadlines and consider offering more time for students."

Academic.question: "The online assessments are too difficult and do not match the class material."
Academic.answer: "We will gather feedback from students and instructors to ensure the online assessments are in line with the course material. Adjustments will be made if necessary."

Academic.question: "I am unable to access certain online learning materials."
Academic.answer: "Please try clearing your browser cache and re-login. If the problem persists, our technical support team will assist you with resolving the issue."

Academic.question: "The course instructor doesn't reply to emails in a timely manner."
Academic.answer: "We will notify the instructor regarding your concerns. Meanwhile, feel free to reach out to the academic coordinator if you need immediate assistance."

Academic.question: "The grading criteria for assignments and exams were unclear."
Academic.answer: "We will request the course instructor to provide more detailed grading rubrics for better understanding. Your feedback is valuable for improving clarity."

Academic.question: "I am unable to access my course materials because of a system error."
Academic.answer: "We have reported this issue to the IT department. They will resolve the system error, and you should regain access shortly."

Academic.question: "The lectures are too fast-paced for me to follow."
Academic.answer: "We will inform the instructor to adjust the pace of the lectures or consider supplementary tutorials to help with understanding."

Academic.question: "The classroom environment is not conducive to learning (e.g., overcrowding, distractions)."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for sharing your concern. We will evaluate the classroom size and consider additional measures to minimize distractions and improve the learning environment."

Academic.question: "The course material is not aligned with the lecture content."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for your feedback. We will review the course material and lecture structure to ensure better alignment."

Academic.question: "I was marked as absent in a class that I attended."
Academic.answer: "We will review the attendance records for accuracy. You will be updated on any corrections made."

Academic.question: "The assignments and exams focus too much on theory and not enough on practical application."
Academic.answer: "Your concern has been noted. We will provide more hands-on projects and practical assignments in future courses."

Academic.question: "I don't understand the grading criteria for my assignments."
Academic.answer: "We will arrange a session where you can discuss grading criteria with your instructor. Clarification will be provided for future assignments."

Academic.question: "My classmate is constantly disrupting the class, making it difficult to focus."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for your feedback. We will investigate the situation and take appropriate action to ensure a better learning environment."

Academic.question: "The course is too advanced for my current level of knowledge."
Academic.answer: "We will notify the instructor and consider offering additional support such as remedial sessions or supplementary learning resources."

Academic.question: "There's no clear roadmap for the course, and I'm confused about the assignments and exams."
Academic.answer: "We will request your instructor to provide a clear roadmap for the course and inform you about the key milestones and deadlines."

Academic.question: "The mid-term exam had questions that were not covered in class."
Academic.answer: "We apologize for any confusion. We will review the exam and ensure that future assessments align better with the covered material."

Academic.question: "The lectures are too long and lack engagement."
Academic.answer: "We will inform the instructor to consider shorter, more interactive sessions to improve student engagement."

Academic.question: "The course schedule is very tight, with little time to prepare for exams."
Academic.answer: "We will review the course schedule and work with the instructor to ensure a more balanced timetable for students."

Academic.question: "The course content is too theoretical and lacks real-world application."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for your feedback. We will collaborate with the course instructor to integrate more practical examples and case studies in the course content."

Academic.question: "The class discussions are not interactive enough."
Academic.answer: "We will request the instructor to incorporate more interactive activities such as discussions, group work, and Q&A sessions to enhance student engagement."

Academic.question: "I missed a class due to personal reasons and the lecture notes are not available."
Academic.answer: "Please reach out to the course coordinator or your classmates for the notes. We will also explore the option of recording lectures for future reference."

Academic.question: "The course assessments do not accurately reflect the level of understanding required."
Academic.answer: "We will review the assessments with the instructor to ensure they reflect the required level of understanding and cognitive skills."

Academic.question: "The instructor did not give enough time for questions during the lecture."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for the feedback. We will ask the instructor to allocate more time for student queries in future sessions."

Academic.question: "There are no office hours available to meet with the instructor."
Academic.answer: "We will notify the instructor to set up designated office hours for students to meet and discuss academic concerns."

Academic.question: "The course is too easy and does not challenge me."
Academic.answer: "We will review the course content and consider offering advanced materials or supplementary resources to challenge students further."

Academic.question: "The assignments are repetitive and do not offer new learning opportunities."
Academic.answer: "We will work with the instructor to ensure that future assignments offer variety and encourage deeper exploration of the subject."

Academic.question: "I did not receive any clarification after requesting help for an assignment."
Academic.answer: "We will ensure that your request is prioritized and will follow up with the instructor to ensure timely assistance."

Academic.question: "The online classes are not as effective as in-person lectures."
Academic.answer: "We understand your concern. We will gather feedback from students and instructors to improve the effectiveness of online learning through better content delivery and interactivity."

Academic.question: "The syllabus is outdated and does not include the latest advancements in the field."
Academic.answer: "Thank you for your feedback. We will review and update the syllabus to reflect the latest developments in the field."

Academic.question: "The textbook recommended for the course is difficult to understand."
Academic.answer: "We will suggest supplementary materials or alternative textbooks to assist you in grasping the concepts better."

Academic.question: "There are too many assignments in a short span of time."
Academic.answer: "We will work with instructors to spread out the assignments and provide more manageable deadlines."

Academic.question: "The lectures are too fast-paced, and I cannot keep up."
Academic.answer: "We will request the instructor to slow down the lecture pace or provide additional resources for students who need more time."

Academic.question: "There is no practical component in the course, and it's only theory-based."
Academic.answer: "We will consider incorporating practical labs or projects to complement the theoretical aspects of the course."

Academic.question: "The professor does not respond to emails regarding class doubts."
Academic.answer: "We will remind the professor to be more responsive to student inquiries. In case of urgency, you can also reach out to the course coordinator."

Academic.question: "The teaching assistant is not helpful during office hours."
Academic.answer: "We will inform the teaching assistant about the feedback and ensure they offer better support during office hours."

Academic.question: "The mid-term exam did not reflect the topics we covered in class."
Academic.answer: "We will review the exam and ensure that future assessments are aligned with the topics covered in class."

Academic.question: "The course lacks detailed lecture slides or notes for reference."
Academic.answer: "We will ask the instructor to provide comprehensive slides or notes to help students prepare better for exams."

Academic.question: "There is no diversity in course materials, with limited perspectives presented."
Academic.answer: "We will work with the instructor to include a more diverse range of materials and viewpoints in the course."

Administrative.question: "My scholarship application is still pending."
Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the delay. Your application has been forwarded to the concerned authority for expedited processing. You will receive an update by [specific date]."

Administrative.question: "The fee payment portal is not working."
Administrative.answer: "Our IT team has been notified of the issue. Meanwhile, please try accessing the portal using a different browser. If the problem persists, we'll assist you with manual payment options."

Administrative.question: "My ID card has not been issued yet."
Administrative.answer: "Your request is being processed. You will receive your ID card by [specific date]. If you need a temporary card, please visit the admin office."

Administrative.question: "The cafeteria menu is not updated daily."
Administrative.answer: "We have informed the cafeteria management. The menu will be updated daily starting this week."

Administrative.question: "The institute bus service is not punctual."
Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the inconvenience. The transport team will address this issue and ensure timely service."

Administrative.question: "The student portal is frequently down."

Administrative.question: "My marksheet hasn't been issued yet."
Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the delay. Your marksheet will be issued within the next 3 working days. Thank you for your patience."

Administrative.question: "I want to change my academic advisor."
Administrative.answer: "Please provide the reason for the change, and we will forward your request to the academic office."

Administrative.question: "The attendance data for my course is incorrect."
Administrative.answer: "Your attendance record will be reviewed. Any discrepancies will be corrected and updated shortly."

Administrative.question: "The registration process is not clear, and I missed the deadline."
Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the confusion. We will review the registration process and ensure better communication for future sessions."

Administrative.question: "The course fee payment link is broken."
Administrative.answer: "Our IT team is working to resolve the issue. Meanwhile, we'll send you a direct link for payment via email."

Administrative.question: "I am unable to access the library resources remotely."
Administrative.answer: "We have informed the library staff. Remote access will be restored within [specific time]."

Administrative.question: "I lost my certificate and need a duplicate."

Administrative.question: "The online course registration system is very slow."
Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the inconvenience. Our technical team is working on improving the system's speed and efficiency."

Administrative.question: "There are no instructions for the final exam in the course portal."

Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide your student ID, and we will investigate the issue and restore access promptly."

Administrative.question: "I am having trouble accessing my transcript."
Administrative.answer: "We will look into this issue and ensure that your transcript is accessible through the portal by [specific date]."

Administrative.question: "I did not receive my hostel accommodation confirmation."
Administrative.answer: "Your accommodation request is being processed. We will send you a confirmation within [specific time]."

Administrative.question: "The registration process for extra-curricular activities is confusing."
Administrative.answer: "Thank you for the feedback. We will simplify the registration process and provide clearer instructions for students in the future."

Administrative.question: "My leave application was not approved in time."
Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the delay. We will review your leave application and ensure timely approvals moving forward."

Administrative.question: "There is a delay in the refund of my security deposit."

Administrative.question: "I didn't receive my course material in time for the semester start."
Administrative.answer: "We will notify the academic office to ensure that course materials are distributed to students ahead of time for future semesters."

Administrative.question: "The email communication from the institute is too frequent and overwhelming."
Administrative.answer: "We understand your concern. We will streamline email communication and ensure only important updates are sent to avoid inbox overload."

Administrative.question: "The student portal is very slow and difficult to navigate."
Administrative.answer: "We are working on improving the performance and user experience of the portal. An update will be available soon."

Administrative.question: "I am unable to access the class schedule on the portal."
Administrative.answer: "The issue has been reported. We will resolve it and ensure that the schedule is accessible without delay."

Administrative.question: "I did not receive any notification regarding the deadline extension for assignments."
Administrative.answer: "We will ensure that such notifications are sent on time in the future. Please check your email or portal for updates."

Administrative.question: "I want to appeal my grade, but I don't know the process."
Administrative.answer: "We will provide detailed instructions on the grade appeal process. Please submit your appeal within the specified time frame for consideration."

Administrative.question: "The communication from the administrative office is unclear and inconsistent."
Administrative.answer: "We appreciate your feedback. We will review our communication process and work towards providing clearer, more consistent updates."

Administrative.question: "I am unable to get a response from the help desk."
Administrative.answer: "We will escalate your issue to the help desk supervisor and ensure that you receive assistance promptly."

Administrative.question: "There is no proper mechanism to provide feedback about courses."

Administrative.question: "I am unable to register for the elective courses I need."

Administrative.question: "The online registration for exams is not working."

Administrative.question: "I was charged extra fees for something I was not informed about."

Administrative.question: "The administrative staff is unhelpful when I need assistance."

Administrative.question: "I have not received my degree certificate after completing my program."

Administrative.answer: "We have informed the technical team. They will resolve the issue and ensure your ID card is functional."

Administrative.question: "I missed the registration deadline for an important event."
Administrative.answer: "We will review the registration timeline and ensure that all students are given ample time to register for future events."

Administrative.question: "I am facing difficulty in accessing the e-library resources."

Administrative.answer: "We have reported this issue to the IT department. They will improve the system's stability and ensure it can handle high traffic."

Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the delay. We will follow up with the administration and ensure you receive an update soon."

Administrative.question: "The exam scheduling system is disorganized, and I have conflicting exam dates."
Administrative.answer: "We will investigate the scheduling conflict and work to reschedule your exams to ensure no overlaps."

Administrative.question: "The registration portal crashed during my exam registration."
Administrative.answer: "We will report this to the IT department for an immediate fix, and we'll allow you to register manually."

Administrative.question: "There is a lack of transparency in the fee payment process."
Administrative.answer: "We will work to improve the clarity of the fee payment process and ensure that all charges are clearly explained."

Administrative.question: "I was not informed about the extension for assignment submission."
Administrative.answer: "We will ensure that future extension notifications are sent out in a timely manner via email or the student portal."

Administrative.question: "I received conflicting information from different administrative departments."
Administrative.answer: "We will streamline communication between departments to ensure consistent and accurate information is provided to students."

Administrative.question: "There are no clear instructions for the scholarship application process."
Administrative.answer: "We will provide clearer guidelines and a step-by-step process for students applying for scholarships."

Administrative.question: "I had issues receiving my refund for a canceled event."
Administrative.answer: "We apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide your event details, and we will expedite your refund process."

Administrative.question: "I am facing difficulty in accessing course materials through the student portal."
Administrative.answer: "We have notified the IT team, and they will resolve this issue to ensure that course materials are accessible without any problems."

Administrative.question: "I need an urgent document from the administration, but I am not getting any response."
Administrative.answer: "We will escalate your request and ensure that you receive the required document at the earliest."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "The water supply in my hostel is inconsistent."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "Thank you for reporting this issue. The maintenance team has been alerted and will resolve the problem within the next 24 hours. Please let us know if the issue persists."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "There is no adequate lighting in the hostel corridors."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We have informed the hostel management to prioritize this. Additional lights will be installed by [specific date]."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "There is no internet connection in my hostel."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "The IT department has been notified. The issue will be resolved within 24 hours."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "My hostel room is very noisy, and I can't focus on my studies."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We have informed the hostel warden. Noise control measures will be implemented, and alternative room assignments will be considered."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "There is no hot water supply in my hostel bathroom."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "The maintenance team has been alerted, and the issue will be fixed by [specific date]."

Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We are reviewing the quality of the hostel furniture and will arrange for replacements if necessary."

Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We understand your concern. We will forward your request to the hostel management and explore the possibility of policy adjustments."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "My room does not have sufficient ventilation."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "The hostel bathroom is not cleaned regularly."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We apologize for the inconvenience. We have informed the housekeeping team to increase the frequency of cleaning in your area."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "The Wi-Fi signal in the hostel is weak and unreliable."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "The IT department has been notified. They will improve the Wi-Fi signal strength in the hostel by [specific date]."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "There is no common space for students to socialize in the hostel."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We will review the available spaces in the hostel and explore the possibility of creating more common areas for students."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "My hostel room is not cleaned regularly."

Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We take safety seriously. Please report any specific safety concerns, and we will ensure that appropriate measures are taken to improve security."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "The hot water supply in the hostel is not working."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We apologize for the inconvenience. Maintenance has been notified, and the issue will be resolved within 24 hours."

Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We will consider creating a recreational space or common area for students to relax and socialize."

Hostel & Accommodation.question: "The hostel charges are unreasonable given the services provided."
Hostel & Accommodation.answer: "We will review the hostel fee structure to ensure it is fair and reflective of the services offered."

Infrastructure.question: "The Wi-Fi speed in the library is too slow."
Infrastructure.answer: "We understand the inconvenience. The IT department has been informed and will upgrade the network speed by [specific date]."

Infrastructure.question: "The lab equipment in the electronics lab is not functioning properly."
Infrastructure.answer: "The lab in-charge has been informed, and a technician will inspect the equipment within 48 hours."

Infrastructure.question: "The projector in the classroom is not working."
Infrastructure.answer: "The issue has been reported to the technical support team. It will be fixed before the next class."

Infrastructure.question: "There is no drinking water available in the lab area."
Infrastructure.answer: "We will install additional water dispensers in the lab area within the week."

Infrastructure.question: "The gym equipment is outdated and unsafe."
Infrastructure.answer: "We have notified the sports department. New equipment is being procured and will be installed soon."

Infrastructure.question: "The library doesn't have enough copies of essential textbooks."
Infrastructure.answer: "The library team will procure additional copies and notify you when they are available."

Health & Safety.question: "The medical center is not open during the designated hours."
Health & Safety.answer: "We apologize for the inconvenience. We will ensure that the medical center adheres to the schedule. In case of emergencies, please contact [emergency number]."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus is poorly lit during nighttime, and it feels unsafe."
Health & Safety.answer: "Your safety is our priority. Additional lighting and security patrols will be arranged immediately. Thank you for highlighting this concern."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no fire extinguishers in the hostel."
Health & Safety.answer: "Thank you for raising this issue. Fire extinguishers will be installed in all hostel buildings within the next 3 days."

Health & Safety.question: "The first aid kit in the lab is not restocked."
Health & Safety.answer: "The lab in-charge has been informed. The kit will be restocked by the end of the day."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus has poor accessibility for students with disabilities."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will assess the campus accessibility and work with the relevant departments to implement improvements, such as ramps and accessible facilities."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no emergency exit signs in the classrooms."
Health & Safety.answer: "The safety team has been notified. Emergency exit signs will be installed in all classrooms within the next [specific time]."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus security personnel are not attentive and seem uninterested."
Health & Safety.answer: "We take your safety seriously. The security team will undergo a review and receive additional training to improve vigilance."

Health & Safety.question: "I am not sure where to go for medical assistance on campus."
Health & Safety.answer: "The campus medical center is located at [specific location]. You can contact the emergency services at [emergency number] for immediate help."

Health & Safety.question: "The lighting in some areas of the campus is too dim, making it unsafe to walk at night."
Health & Safety.answer: "We appreciate your concern. Additional lighting will be installed in dimly lit areas for student safety by [specific date]."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus is not wheelchair accessible."
Health & Safety.answer: "We are reviewing campus accessibility and will work on providing ramps and other facilities to make the campus more accessible to all students."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no health check-up facilities on campus."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will introduce regular health check-up camps on campus to ensure students' health and well-being."

Health & Safety.question: "There is no emergency evacuation plan available in the classrooms."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will ensure that all classrooms are equipped with visible emergency evacuation plans and conduct drills regularly."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no sufficient medical supplies in the campus first-aid kits."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will inspect the first-aid kits across campus and restock them with necessary supplies."

Health & Safety.question: "I was feeling unwell and had no one to contact for help during the night."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will introduce an on-call medical service that students can reach out to during off-hours for urgent assistance."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus gym is overcrowded during peak hours."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will assess the usage patterns of the gym and consider expanding the facility or introducing booking systems to manage crowding."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no clear hygiene standards in the hostel kitchen."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will review the cleanliness and hygiene practices of the hostel kitchen and implement strict hygiene protocols."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus lacks clean drinking water stations."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will install additional water dispensers in key areas of the campus to provide easy access to clean drinking water."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no proper medical records being kept for students."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will implement a more structured medical record-keeping system to ensure that students' health data is securely stored and accessible."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus is poorly lit, making it unsafe at night."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will increase the lighting in poorly lit areas of the campus to improve safety and visibility during nighttime."

Health & Safety.question: "There is no first-aid kit in the classrooms."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will ensure that all classrooms are equipped with first-aid kits for emergencies."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus lacks proper fire safety equipment."
Health & Safety.answer: "We take safety seriously. We will review and update our fire safety protocols, ensuring that fire extinguishers and alarms are installed in all necessary areas."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no proper guidelines for health and wellness on campus."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will introduce health and wellness programs, along with clear guidelines, to promote a healthy lifestyle among students."

Health & Safety.question: "There are not enough mental health resources or counseling services available."
Health & Safety.answer: "We recognize the importance of mental health. We will expand counseling services and introduce awareness programs to ensure students' well-being."

Health & Safety.question: "There is a lack of proper medical facilities on campus."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will review our campus health services and consider improving the availability of medical resources for students."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus is not well-lit at night, making it unsafe to walk."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will enhance the campus lighting in poorly lit areas to improve student safety during night hours."

Health & Safety.question: "The washrooms on campus are not clean and lack hygiene."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will inform the housekeeping team to ensure more frequent cleaning and hygiene checks in the campus washrooms."

Health & Safety.question: "The cafeteria does not offer enough healthy food options."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will discuss with the cafeteria management to introduce healthier food options and ensure a balanced menu for students."

Health & Safety.question: "There is no designated space for students to exercise or relax."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will explore the possibility of creating a designated wellness or recreation area to promote physical and mental health."

Health & Safety.question: "I was not informed about the vaccination drive on campus."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will improve communication about health-related events and vaccination drives to ensure all students are informed in a timely manner."

Health & Safety.question: "There are not enough fire exits in the academic buildings."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will assess the current safety measures and ensure that all academic buildings have adequate fire exits."

Health & Safety.question: "There are no proper sanitation facilities during outdoor events or activities."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will ensure that sufficient sanitation facilities are provided during future outdoor events to maintain hygiene."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus lacks proper seating areas in outdoor spaces for students to relax."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will explore the possibility of installing more seating areas around the campus for students to enjoy."

Health & Safety.question: "There is no clear procedure for handling medical emergencies on campus."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will establish a clear and accessible emergency medical response plan to ensure students' safety during medical emergencies."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus is not easily accessible for students with disabilities."
Health & Safety.answer: "We are working on making the campus more accessible, including adding ramps, elevators, and other support systems for students with disabilities."

Health & Safety.question: "There is no proper parking facility for students' bicycles or motorbikes."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will look into providing designated and secure parking spaces for students' bicycles and motorbikes."

Health & Safety.question: "The gym on campus is overcrowded and does not have enough equipments."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will assess the gym usage and consider expanding the facilities or introducing a booking system to manage crowding."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus lacks sufficient drinking water stations."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will install more drinking water stations in key areas to ensure students have easy access to clean water."

Health & Safety.question: "The air quality in some campus buildings is poor and needs improvement."
Health & Safety.answer: "We will work on improving the ventilation and air quality in affected buildings to create a healthier environment."

Health & Safety.question: "The campus lacks adequate mental health support services."
Health & Safety.answer: "We are expanding our mental health services and will provide more counseling options and workshops to support students."

Disciplinary.question: "I am being harassed by a fellow student."
Disciplinary.answer: "We take such matters seriously. Your complaint has been forwarded to the grievance redressal committee. You will be contacted privately to discuss the next steps."

Disciplinary.question: "There is a lot of noise in the hostel after quiet hours."
Disciplinary.answer: "The hostel warden has been notified. Quiet hours will be strictly enforced moving forward."

Disciplinary.question: "I witnessed unfair treatment by a faculty member."
Disciplinary.answer: "We take such complaints seriously. Please share specific details, and our grievance committee will investigate."

Disciplinary.question: "Bullying incidents are occurring in the hostel."
Disciplinary.answer: "This issue is under investigation. Anonymous reporting is encouraged to ensure action is taken swiftly."

Disciplinary.question: "I witnessed a violation of academic integrity but don't know how to report it."
Disciplinary.answer: "We have an anonymous reporting system in place for such violations. You can report the issue directly through the grievance portal."

Disciplinary.question: "A faculty member showed favoritism towards certain students."
Disciplinary.answer: "We take such concerns seriously. Please provide more details, and the grievance committee will investigate the matter."

Disciplinary.question: "I was unfairly penalized for a minor violation."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will review the circumstances and the disciplinary decision. A meeting with the concerned department will be arranged if necessary."

Disciplinary.question: "I feel discriminated against in my group project because of my background."
Disciplinary.answer: "We are committed to creating an inclusive environment. We will look into the matter and take appropriate actions to resolve any concerns of discrimination."

Disciplinary.question: "There is bullying happening in my department, and it's affecting my well-being."
Disciplinary.answer: "Your well-being is our priority. We will investigate the situation and provide you with the necessary support and intervention."

Disciplinary.question: "I was falsely accused of cheating during an exam."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will conduct a thorough investigation into the matter and ensure that your side of the story is heard. We aim for a fair and impartial review."

Disciplinary.question: "I was harassed by a fellow student in the hostel."
Disciplinary.answer: "We take such issues seriously. Please provide more details so that we can initiate an investigation and take immediate action."

Disciplinary.question: "The disciplinary actions taken against me were not communicated properly."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will review the process and ensure that any disciplinary actions are communicated clearly and with full transparency."

Disciplinary.question: "I feel uncomfortable in certain group activities due to peer pressure."
Disciplinary.answer: "We understand your concern. We will address the issue with the concerned department to ensure a respectful and inclusive atmosphere in group activities."

Disciplinary.question: "My academic freedom is being restricted by a faculty member."
Disciplinary.answer: "We respect your academic freedom. Please share specific details, and we will investigate and address the matter with the faculty member involved."

Disciplinary.question: "I feel unfairly treated in the grading system compared to my peers."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will review your grading criteria and discuss it with the concerned faculty member to ensure fairness in the assessment process."

Disciplinary.question: "A fellow student has been consistently violating campus rules, but no action is being taken."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will investigate the matter and ensure appropriate disciplinary actions are taken in accordance with the campus policies."

Disciplinary.question: "I feel uncomfortable with the behavior of a faculty member towards students."
Disciplinary.answer: "We take such concerns seriously. Please provide further details, and we will address the issue promptly."

Disciplinary.question: "I was given an unfair penalty for a group project mistake that wasn't mine."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will review the incident and ensure that penalties are applied fairly based on individual contributions to group work."

Disciplinary.question: "I was accused of cheating during an exam, but I didn't do it."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will conduct a fair investigation into the matter and ensure that your case is reviewed thoroughly and impartially."

Disciplinary.question: "I feel I was wrongly expelled or suspended."
Disciplinary.answer: "We will review the circumstances leading to your expulsion or suspension and ensure that the decision was based on fair grounds."
